post.author: 이계영

comment.author: 김성욱
comment.content: I see. So, the methods - ejbStore() and ejbLoad() are critical factors that affect the performance issue! Thank you so much.

post.content: Using value object can reduce transfering overhead. But If you use session facade which call local entity beans, the transfering overhead is not much. You can reduce a lot of overhead mainly because accessing value object's member variable doesn't call ejbStore.
post.title: RE: RE: RE: Sample code using Value Object
